definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: A splices together two different kinds of protocols .
sentences.chinese: 网关可拼接两种不同的协议。

sentences.english: Twin-needle reinforced stitching with a high tensile strength thread.
sentences.chinese: 双针具有很高的拉伸强度螺纹钢筋拼接。

sentences.english: Allover contrast stitching for casual class.
sentences.chinese: 休闲类的全面性对比拼接。

sentences.english: The achievement of the expressive intonations for concatenative speech synthesis may be based on the layered corpus.
sentences.chinese: 数据库为实现表情语调的拼接合成奠定了基础。

sentences.english: Otherwise, we can only use the short edge of a plurality of film blocks into the gap.
sentences.chinese: 不然只能用多个膜块的短边拼接成这条鸿沟。

sentences.english: The long neck flange should have stress-relief heat treatment after welding.
sentences.chinese: 拼接法兰应进行焊后消除应力热处理。

sentences.english: The stand or fall of keel quality affects the integrality of joining together and flatness.
sentences.chinese: 龙骨质量的好坏影响到拼接的完整性和平整度。

sentences.english: The bamboo flooring is made by high temperature and high pressure, also split joint by adhesives.
sentences.chinese: 联谊竹地板采用粘胶剂拼接，并施以高温高压而成。

sentences.english: These results suggest that trans-splicing may participate in antibody gene expression.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果提示反式拼接有可能参与了抗体基因的表达。

sentences.english: This regular mosaic is a pattern made up of equilateral triangles.
sentences.chinese: 这个规则的马赛克是由多个等边三角形拼接而成。

sentences.english: They are all quite old, smiple and crude. Some are even made only by connecting two stones.
sentences.chinese: 有些甚至于只是两条长长的麻石砖拼接成的。

sentences.english: Every new idea is just a mashup or a remix of previous ideas.
sentences.chinese: 每个新的想法，不过是以前想法的混合与拼接。

sentences.english: The application of sub-aperture stitching in long optical flat was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究子孔径拼接在长平晶测试中的应用。

sentences.english: Finally the design and application achievement of this hot forging die are described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了油孔螺塞拼接式热锻模具的设计及其应用效果。

sentences.english: The critical technique of Image Mosaicing is image registration.
sentences.chinese: 图象拼接的关键技术就是图象配准。

sentences.english: The plank was spliced with nails.
sentences.chinese: 那块木板是用钉子拼接的。

definition: to mix and match (of clothing etc)
to pair up/to match/to arrange in pairs/to add sth into a group
